title: xnLinkFinder
description: A python tool used to discover endpoints, potential parameters, and a target specific wordlist for a given target

items.definition: Find Links from a specific target
Find Links from a list of URLs
Find Links from a files in a directory
Find Links from a Burp project
Find Links from an OWASP ZAP project
Find Links from a Cadio export CSV file
Find Links from a Waymore results directory
Find Links from a specific target
items.code: xnLinkFinder -i target.com -sp target_prefix.txt -sf target_scope.txt -spo -inc -vv -H 'Authorization: Bearer XXXXXXXXXXXXXX' -c 'SessionId=MYSESSIONID' -u desktop mobile -d 10

items.definition: Find Links from a Burp project
